generalInfo:
From Amman's citadel enjoy sweeping views across the capital of Jordan, - a cosmopolitan city with deep roots in biblical history. See the Dead Sea Scrolls in the Jordan Museum, stroll past the Roman theatre , explore the Greco-Roman ruins of Jerash and get an all-natural skin treatment at the Dead Sea.
Follow the King’s Highway south, travelling along one of the oldest roads in the world to visit Mount Nebo and Madaba then the ancient red-rose city of Petra. Spend a night in the Wahiba Desert, under the stars.
End with 2 nights in the Feynam Reserve -spectacular mountains and Wadis along the face of the Great Rift Valley with a a melting pot of species.

dayInfo.description: Arrival Amman airport, where you will be met prior to immigration for assistance with a free visa then transfer to your hotel- Dinner box & Overnight at Amman Hotel
City tour of Amman - Dinner at Local Restaurant . Overnight at Amman Hotel
Amman - Dead Sea -swim in the Dead Sea’s salty waters and one of the lowest points on earth- Pella - Umm Qais – Amman – Dinner & Overnight at Amman Hotel
Amman - Jerash - Ajloun – Amman – Dinner & Overnight at Amman hotel
Amman - Madaba -mosaic city . Ascend Mount Nebo for panoramic views over Judah and Jericho.- Kerak – Petra – Dinner & Overnight at Petra Hotel
Full day tour of the spectacular sandstone city of Petra - built in the 3rd century BC by the Nabataeans, who carved palaces, temples, tombs, Dinner & Overnight at Petra Hotel
Petra - Wadi Rum (Jeep Tour for 02 Hours) –experience the extraordinary desert scenery of Wadi Rum, a rugged moonscape of huge sandstone mountains Dinner & Overnight at Camp
Wadi Rum – Transfer to Feynan – Dinner & Overnight at Eco-lodge
Free day in Feynan – Dinner & Overnight at Eco-lodge ( many hikes on offer - ask for details and cost)
Feynan – Transfer to Amman Airport for departure
